description:
After having fun at the beach, they came to an inn. They enjoyed themselves by going to saunas, outdoor hot springs, and playing Mahjong. With Arashi`s "kindness,"Jun ends up sharing a room with Hajime. To keep her secret, Jun ends up buying men`s underwear, and avoiding the bath. But in the end, Jun gets caught by Hajime and gets dragged to the bath. Arashi and Kaya save Jun. With Arashi`s proposal, they end up doing a courage-test. Arashi and Jun coincidentally pair up. Jun asks Arashi how she feels about Hajime
Source: crunchyroll
